name: Mixtec
description:
Mixtec Game

Mixtec is an Aztec Mythology "Tower Defense" game made for Totem Legacy Jam 

The Aztec people need to protect their most important God, Huītzilōpōchtli, God of War and Sun.  The Conquistador enemy allied with enemy clans to bring down the Aztec Empire by destroying their God!  Your mission is to protect him at all costs!

Defend Huītzilōpōchtli with your Totems and don't let them reach him, that will make him ANGRY!
